name: ngn-tester
description: Test NGN in different JavaScript runtimes.

scripts.browser:compatibility: echo 'Building...' && npm run build:browser && echo 'Testing modern browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0.min.js && echo 'Testing ES6 browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es6 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0-es6.min.js && echo 'Testing ES5 browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es5 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0-es5.min.js && echo Done.
scripts.browser:compatibility:current: npm run build:browser && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0.min.js
scripts.browser:compatibility:current:json: npm run build:browser && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc -f json ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0.min.js > browsercompatibility.json
scripts.browser:compatibility:es6: npm run build:browser && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es6 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0-es6.min.js
scripts.browser:compatibility:es6:json: npm run build:browser && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es6 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc -f json ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0-es6.min.js > browsercompatibility-es6.json
scripts.browser:compatibility:es5: npm run build:browser && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es5 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0-es5.min.js
scripts.browser:compatibility:es5:json: npm run build:browser && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es5 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc -f json ../build/tmp/browser/browser-ngn/ngn-2.0.0-es5.min.js > browsercompatibility-es5.json
scripts.node:sanity: npm run build:test:node && tap --no-esm -r source-map-support/register -R spec ./*-sanity/**/*.js
